# Resources {#resources}

Here, sits any general useful resources that cover topics across the spectrum of science.

- [JEFworks](https://jef.works/lab/) has a some sections for writing an abstract, reviewing papers and giving a poster presentation. 
- [Jeff Leeks book](https://leanpub.com/modernscientist) is free and outlines the core principles behind being a scientist in a open source way.
